item.description:
* live music with Marie Aussant's jazz trio
* Marie Aussant is French, as is the menu at Petit Robert.
* The music starts at 5:30. I'll arrive between 5:30 & 6:00.
* Look for the balloon

Please keep your RSVP up-to-date, if you say that you're coming and then find that you can't make it after all, please change your RSVP to "no."
item.how_to_find_us: In the bar area - Look for the balloon

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Petit Robert
